title: AI datacenter boom triples US gas power builds, widening carbon footprint
full_text: AI datacenter boom triples US gas power builds, widening carbon footprint. Reduce emissions? Screw that - we have money to lose and memes to generate Fossil fuel-fired power plant development is roaring back to life in the US thanks to the AI datacenter boom, with data from 2025 suggesting we're reaching the point where the renewabl….
